text: Ani jevha te tyaca marganni, jyanca adesa tyancya pityane dila hota, gele, kahica navhate ki allahane ji gosta niscita keli ahe, ticyapasuna te tyanna kincitahi vacavatila. Tathapi yakubacya manata eka vicara ala, jo tyane purna kela. Nihsansaya te amhi sikavilelya tya jnanane sampanna hote, parantu adhikansa loka janata nahita
